short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts your selected data to ISL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to convert your text to ISL(Indian sign language). You can either select the text, right click on it and select convert text to ISL or straight away type your text in our extension. Rest is up to us. Hope your appreciate our efforts.
